title: Karavalli
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Indian, Buffet, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Indian food restaurant. While the menu is predominately meat, there is a vegetarian section with 12 main entrees, and a vegan section with 6 main entrees, clearly labeled. The servers will help you identify the vegetarian and vegan appetizers. Accommodating to veg diets. The lunch buffet includes a few veg options.
